snippet.title: MY DAUGHTER IS A CULTIST! SE Trailer PC Horror Game Steam / Itch. io
snippet.description:
MY DAUGHTER IS A CULTIST! SE available on Steam and itch.io on OCT 26 2023

WISHLIST HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2546710/MY_DAUGHTER_IS_A_CULTIST_SE/

YOU'RE JUST A NORMAL GUY TRYING TO GET SOME SLEEP. YOU HEAR A BUMP IN THE NIGHT. WHAT WAS THAT? WHY IS YOUR DAUGHTER ACTING SO WEIRD? IS IT PARENTHOOD OR A HORRIBLE CURIOSITY THAT COMPELS YOU TO FIND OUT? 
A Short horror experience by Virtua Worlds.

YOU'RE JUST A NORMAL GUY TRYING TO GET SOME SLEEP. YOU HEAR A BUMP IN THE NIGHT.
WHAT WAS THAT? WHY IS YOUR DAUGHTER ACTING SO WEIRD? IS IT PARENTHOOD OR A HORRIBLE CURIOSITY THAT COMPELS YOU TO FIND OUT?

OBJECTIVE:

FIND OUT WHY YOUR DAUGHTER IS ACTING SO WEIRD AND WHAT'S MAKING ALL THIS NOISE.

FEATURES:

• JAPANESE HORROR MEETS LOVECRAFT

• MULTIPLE ENDINGS (4)

• MANGA STYLE VISUALS

• CONTROLLER SUPPORT

• KEYBOARD AND MOUSE SUPPORT

• PHOTOMODE WITH STICKERS AND ALTERNATE OUTFITS

• ENDING GALLERY

------------------------------------------------------
Mature Content Description

This horror experience features explicit graphic scenes of cartoon violence including extreme gore, dismemberment, and suicide.
------------------------------------------------------

Learn more about us and upcoming projects at: 
HTTP://VIRTUAWORLDS.IO

#manga #horrorgaming inspired by#junjiito #indiegame #halloween #anime #steamgame #horror #jhorror
